alert.note: Alert for Concho; McCulloch; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 9:47PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McCulloch, northeastern Menard and southeastern Concho Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 946 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-83 Near The Menard and Concho County Line, or near Eden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eden, Melvin, Pear Valley, Salt Gap, Us-83 Near The Menard- Concho County Line and The Intersection Of Us- 87 And Ranch Road 2134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
